item.title: Extracting Payload Keys from Profile Manager
item.description: I’m developing ProfileCreator, an open source configuration profile creation tool. While doing this I’ve been looking at ways to automatically and repeatedly create a list of all available payload keys and their configuration for use in my app.

item.title: No Privileged Helper Tool Left Behind
item.description: With every release of OS X, Apple continues to improve and add new features to help developers in minimizing their application’s attack surface. And as privilege escalation is the base of most attacks, that is one of the most important vectors to keep patched and secure.

item.title: Script Tip: Modifying text appearance in console output
item.description: When writing user-facing scripts you sometimes want to emphasize a word or a line in the text printed to the console to make it easier to read (or harder to miss).

item.title: Script Tip: Split line into variables
item.description: This is a BASH script tip for improving multi-variable assignments from a single input line.

item.title: App Store Adoption Eligibility Query
item.description: When you buy a new computer from Apple, the following Mac App Store applications are pre-installed on the system without a tie to a particular Apple ID:

item.title: Apple Product Marketing Name Query
item.description: Apple has a web service you can query for an Apple product marketing name.
